# Types used in Cerebro


# Clear values: values that are visible to every party. Use these values to store global variables and constants which do not depend on any user's input.


# cint: A clear integer modulo p, where p is the prime field

```
# Assign x = 5 mod p
x = cint(5)
```

# cfix: A clear fixed-point number.

```
x = cfix(3.5)
```
